tool_description: Check out our new Developer Portal and docs: https://www.flowcode.com/developer-portal
title: Flowcode

api_list.name: Create QR Code
api_list.description: This API takes an endpoint and return and image for a QR Code in either svg, png, jpg, or pdf format

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: This is the URL the QR code will scan to

parameters.name: imageType
parameters.description:
Response image type:
png, svg, pdf, or jpg

parameters.name: bgColor
parameters.description:
Hex background color for flowcode.
Format: #rrggbb or transparent for transparent background.

parameters.name: fgColor
parameters.description:
Hex foreground color for flowcode
Format: #rrggbb

parameters.name: rimTextTop
parameters.description: For style=rim, the call to action text to put at top of the rim

parameters.name: style
parameters.description:
Style of flowcode:
default, inset, or rim

parameters.name: moduleShape
parameters.description:
Shape to use for code pattern:
default, circle, square, or diamond

parameters.name: rimTextBottom
parameters.description: For style=rim, the call to action text to put at bottom of the rim

utterances.utterance: Create a QR code for the URL 'https://www.example.com' in PNG format.
Generate a QR code for 'https://www.mywebsite.com' as a PDF with a transparent background.
Make a QR code for 'https://www.flowcode.com' in SVG format with a blue foreground color.
Create a QR code for 'https://www.test.com' in JPG format with a green background and red foreground.
Generate a QR code for 'https://www.demo.com' in SVG format with a rim style and top text 'Scan Here'.
Create a QR code for 'https://www.website.com' in PNG format with a diamond module shape.
Generate a QR code for 'https://www.example.org' in PDF format with an inset style and bottom text 'Click to Scan'.
Make a QR code for 'https://www.sample.com' in JPG format with a circle module shape and a yellow background.
Create a QR code for 'https://www.flowcode.dev' in SVG format with a default style and a purple foreground.
Generate a QR code for 'https://www.newwebsite.com' in PNG format with a square module shape and a gray background.
